column1: 321212,Diesel Motor Mechanic,,"Inspect mechanical components of vehicles to identify problems
column3: Replace or repair non-engine automotive or vehicle components
column5: Adjust vehicle components according to specifications
column9: Operate cranes, hoists or other moving or lifting equipment
column11: Operate transportation equipment to demonstrate function or malfunction
column13: Repair defective engines or engine components
column15: Test mechanical equipment to ensure proper functioning
column25: Lubricate equipment to allow proper functioning
column35: Observe equipment in operation to detect potential problems
column37: Replace worn, damaged or defective mechanical parts
column41: Troubleshoot equipment or systems operation problems
